original_text:
Has his unfailing love vanished forever?
    Has his promise failed for all time?
korean_text: 그의 인자하심은 영원히 끝났는가, 그의 약속하심도 영구히 폐하였는가,

sentences.original_text: Has his unfailing love vanished forever?
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 변치 않는 사랑이 영원히 사라졌습니까?

sentences.original_text: Has his promise failed for all time?
